title: Five on treasure island. Five get into trouble
creator_credit: Andrew Morgan, Tony Kysh, Michael Kerrigan, John Price, Zweites Deutsches Fernsehen, Tyne Tees Television, HTV, Frankfurter Film and Zenith North Portman
brief_description: Five on a treasure island sees the Famous Five discover an old shipwreck on Kirrin Island which leads the Five into trouble and the discovery of buried treasure. “Five get into trouble” sees the Five on a cycling holiday, a case of mistaken identity, and a horde of stolen diamonds lead to kidnap and an exciting adventure in an old Elizabethan manor.
